programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a divorced mother is found murdered in her home, police discover she had an unusual array of people involved in her life.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After an elderly woman comes into a large sum of money, she is attacked; investigators uncover a twisted tale of of addiction, brutality and betrayal.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a missing woman is discovered by a deputy to be murdered in the backyard of her family home, investigators must learn whether the victim was killed by a mysterious driver seen lingering outside the house, or someone unexpected.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A U.S. Navy veteran is brutally beaten to death during a home robbery; to find the killer, police must sift through various lies as several suspects desperately attempt to cover their tracks.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When a schoolteacher is gunned down in public, a known felon's DNA and phone records link him to the crime; however, after investigators arrest the man, they discover the real killer might actually be someone else entirely.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: After a loving wife and mother is found shot to death in her own bed, the case goes cold for two years until determined detectives set their sights on justice and reveal a murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When young woman's body is found burning in the woods, investigators are left with many questions; they follow a trail of fire, fury, and falsities to get to the truth.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When Kim Allen is found murdered in her home, her estranged and abusive husband is the likely suspect; risky bluff by detectives takes the case in a surprising direction.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: In 1981, a mother vanishes from the Hernando woods and the case goes cold and 33 years later, local detectives take the baton from Kelly and the Cold Justice team only to discover that getting a confession may be the only way to solve the case.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A mother of two disappears after a night out at a local bar in New Mexico; investigators race the clock in the hopes of finding her alive, and are eventually stunned by what they uncover.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When an athletic and popular college student is violently murdered in her apartment, police track down several surprising suspects, including one with a disturbing obsession, before crucial evidence unmasks a dangerous predator no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A fun-loving 59-year-old man is found shot to death in his home and his beloved jewelry collection has been stolen, leading detectives to a long list of suspects and a killer harboring a dark secret.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A restaurant is robbed and the night manager murdered, leading police to investigate suspicious co-workers, a disgruntled ex-employee and a violent serial attacker.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a secret affair, a kidnapping plot and a racist gang when a young husband-to-be is found shot and stabbed.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother is stabbed to death in a horrifying attack, suspicion falls on those closest to her; a cryptic note and a violent crime spree baffle detectives at first, but they eventually track down a deranged killer no one predicted.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A vibrant young mother of three is murdered in the safety of her own home and investigators look to a history of troubled romances, but when the case goes cold and police can't find the killer, a phone call leads to a culprit hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: An assassination, a bitter custody dispute and a gunman's cryptic words send police scrambling on an interstate hunt to find the killer of a beloved father and husband.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When the strangling death of a young mother and bride-to-be baffles police, detectives probe a workplace grievance in search of a killer, before a cherished possession provides a link to the crime and cracks the case wide open.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A wealthy trader and father of four is gunned-down at home while his family is tied up in a closet; police dig into affairs, mob links and a missing co-worker, until a new lead and a taped phone call reveal a plot decades later.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother is found dead in a field after a night out, police scour security video to retrace a suspect's steps; the discovery of a second crime scene leads to an arrest, before high-tech forensics reveal a truth no one expected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A cat-loving and recently divorced young woman dipping her toes back in the dating game is beaten and strangled in a brutal and unusual way; investigators dive into the murky world of online dating to hunt a killer who could be ready to strike again.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives discover the badly beaten body of a single young woman left bizarrely staged on her bed; fear in the community grows amid a rash of nearby murders until police are handed a break when a fresh look at old evidence points to the killer.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A beloved teacher and mother of four silently vanishes in the middle of the night; a blood-soaked bedroom and lakeside discovery point police to a killer close to home until mysterious tracks in the mud lead to a culprit no one suspected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a loving father of two is gunned down on his driveway, police uncover a hidden affair and workplace grudges before a nervous witness and chilling confession reveal a vicious vendetta from a killer no one expected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a family that runs a beloved vet clinic is gunned down, police investigate disgruntled tenants, a pet owner with an ax to grind and an estranged son; the case stalls until detectives uncover a twisted plot by someone who seemed above suspicion.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother and beloved coworker is found stabbed in her bedroom, investigators are unable to pin down a killer until secret recordings and evidence stashed in a van are found.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: An execution-style shooting of a well-loved, self-made couple; early leads take police down a path of greed and desperation until a paper trail leads to a calculated betrayal shockingly close to home.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a Texas mother is found murdered in an office bathroom, her husband admits a disturbing past while police chase down a serial killer; the case goes cold until an oversight leads to a surprise suspect and an FBI manhunt south of the border.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother vanishes from home, a series of grisly roadside discoveries take police on a hunt for a killer; detectives follow a path of greed and desperation until a shocking twist leads to a culprit with a bizarre motive.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When an outgoing college student is gunned down, police investigate disapproving roommates, a psychic and an infamous serial killer; decades-old evidence reveals a killer that original detectives had previously overlooked.
